properties.title: Wuhu Fengxue Rubber Co.

properties.description:
Hunter Wellington. 
The History of the well established name goes back to 1817. However the iconic rubber boot was not designed until 1856 by American, Harvey Lee Norris. Production began with the North British Rubber Co. in Edinburgh using a new process of vulcanizing natural rubber to create a waterproof effect. Since then production has been bought out a total of four times until it became the Hunter Rubber Company division of Interfloor manufacturing in 2004. The most recent change launched the company as a privately held business under the name Hunter Boots ltd. on April 10, 2006. Headquarters was decided to remain in Edinburgh. Although Dumfries and Galloway MP Russell Brown has voiced concerns that the company is simply retaining a tiny presence in Scotland to keep its Royal Warrants of Appointment. 

Sources:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/uk_news/scotland/south_of_scotland/7379713.stm
http://www.linkedin.com/company/hunter-boot-ltd 
http://harrypseymour.wordpre
